hooks.command: TAG="[$(hostname -s):${CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR##*/}]"; if [[ -n "$CC_TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN" && -n "$CC_TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID" ]]; then MESSAGE="$TAG ${CC_TELEGRAM_STOP_MSG:-Claude Code response completed at $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}"; if [[ "${CC_TELEGRAM_DRY_RUN:-false}" == "true" ]]; then echo "[DRY RUN] $MESSAGE"; else curl -s -X POST "https://api.telegram.org/bot$CC_TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN/sendMessage" -d "chat_id=$CC_TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID" -d "text=$MESSAGE" -d "parse_mode=HTML" >/dev/null 2>&1 || echo "Failed to send Telegram notification"; fi; else echo "Telegram notification skipped: Set CC_TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN and CC_TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID"; fi

TAG="[$(hostname -s):${CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR##*/}]"; if [[ -n "$CC_TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN" && -n "$CC_TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID" ]]; then MESSAGE="$TAG ${CC_TELEGRAM_SUBAGENT_MSG:-Claude Code subagent completed at $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}"; if [[ "${CC_TELEGRAM_DRY_RUN:-false}" == "true" ]]; then echo "[DRY RUN] $MESSAGE"; else curl -s -X POST "https://api.telegram.org/bot$CC_TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN/sendMessage" -d "chat_id=$CC_TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID" -d "text=$MESSAGE" -d "parse_mode=HTML" >/dev/null 2>&1 || echo "Failed to send Telegram notification"; fi; else echo "Telegram notification skipped: Set CC_TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN and CC_TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID"; fi

TAG="[$(hostname -s):${CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR##*/}]"; if [[ -n "$CC_TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN" && -n "$CC_TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID" ]]; then MESSAGE="$TAG ${CC_TELEGRAM_NOTIFY_MSG:-Claude Code notification}"; if [[ "${CC_TELEGRAM_DRY_RUN:-false}" == "true" ]]; then echo "[DRY RUN] $MESSAGE"; else curl -s -X POST "https://api.telegram.org/bot$CC_TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN/sendMessage" -d "chat_id=$CC_TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID" -d "text=$MESSAGE" -d "parse_mode=HTML" >/dev/null 2>&1 || echo "Failed to send Telegram notification"; fi; else echo "Telegram notification skipped: Set CC_TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN and CC_TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID"; fi
